# The `MCAsmInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class is intended to be used as a base class for asm properties and features specific to the target. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCAsmInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class is intended to be used as a base class for asm properties and features specific to the target.

Definition at line 56 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcasminfo-h">MCAsmInfo.h</a>.

### AlignmentIsInBytes {#ac150f03927bf41531f945b3bc5b315e4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::MCAsmInfo::AlignmentIsInBytes = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a></>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
If this is true (the default) then the asmprinter emits &quot;.align N&quot; directives, where N is the number of bytes to align to.

Otherwise, it emits &quot;.align log2(N)&quot;, e.g. 3 to align to an 8 byte boundary. Defaults to true.

  labels = {["protected"]}>
This indicates whether to allow additional &quot;comment strings&quot; to be lexed as a comment.

Setting this attribute to true, will ensure that C-style line comments (// ..), C-style block comments (/&#42; .. &#42;‍/), and &quot;#&quot; are all treated as comments in addition to the string specified by the CommentString attribute. Default is true.
